dialogue.introduction: Yuugumo-class destroyer, I am Makigumo. Following Yuugumo-neesan's example, I'll do my best!
dialogue.library_intro: I'm Makigumo, second ship of the Yuugumo-class Destroyers. While cleaning up after the Hornet, 'situation permitting, tow and capture it'... they said, but that was pretty much impossible... and now Akigumo's pointing and laughing at me. Seriously, what the heck?
dialogue.secretary2: Commander-sama~. Makigumo always has perfect posture. Hey~? My clothes are too big~
dialogue.secretary3: Hawawawawa, nobody but Yuugumo-neesan is allowed to touch me~!
dialogue.secretaryidle: ...I'm always looking at Commander-sama from the screen.
dialogue.secretarymarried: Commander-sama, do your be~st! Makigumo will too!
dialogue.wedding: Commander-sama, thank you very much for letting me take my time today. Makigumo too, has to graduate from Yuugumo-neesan some time. Is that okay?
dialogue.joining_a_fleet: It's Makigumo's turn, I'll do my best!
dialogue.equipment1: Hmmhmmm! My new armament, how is it?
dialogue.docking_moderate_damage: Makigumo, you can really see her damage... I'll have to work harder!
dialogue.ship_construction: A new friend has been born!
dialogue.attack: Heyaaa~ Right in the middle, I'll hit it!
dialogue.night_attack: More than scuttling, I want to shoot at the enemy!
dialogue.artillery_spotting: More than scuttling, I want to shoot at the enemy!
dialogue.night_special_attack_modifier_cutin_at_n: More than scuttling, I want to shoot at the enemy!
dialogue.support_expedition_team_arrival: More than scuttling, I want to shoot at the enemy!
dialogue.minor_damaged1: Fuyaaa, a hit on the stern!
dialogue.minor_damaged2: Fuwaaaaan, even though I thought I could do it today~!
dialogue.moderately_damaged: Hawawawawa, turning on the searchlight at a time like this! Akigumo, you idiot!
dialogue.sunk: Yuugumo-neesan, I can't move anymore, please leave me. My final selfish request... the one to scuttle me, should be you...

hourly.0100: Hawawawa, how is it 1 in the morning~!
hourly.0200: 2 in the morning.... This is Makigumo's limit...
hourly.0300: 3 A.M. Commander-sama, KanColle isn't going anywhere, so let's just sleep~...
hourly.0600: S... s... Si... wa! Sorry, I wasn't sleeping~
hourly.0900: It's 9 o'clock. Look after me today, too! *salute*
hourly.1000: It's now 10 o'clock~. I wonder what kind of person will be your practice buddy today?
hourly.1100: It's 11 o'clock. What will Commander-sama's lunch be today?
hourly.1200: 12 o'clock. On such a fine day, having lunch on deck is nice too~
hourly.1300: 1 P.M. To just daydream with Commander-sama like this, it's somehow relaxing~...
hourly.1400: 2 P.M. Commander-sama~ Let's do special training; special training!
hourly.1500: 3 P.M. Ah, I forgot! I was invited to Kongou's tea party~!
hourly.1600: 4 P.M. Ah, being with Commander-sama is nice... even if I don't go to the tea party...
hourly.1700: It's 5 in the eve~ning. The sun has dissapeared~
hourly.1900: 7 at night. Commander-sama, I desire dinner!
hourly.2000: It's 8 at night. Hey~ Hey~ Commander-sama, is it okay to take a bath?
hourly.2100: It's 9 o'clock~. I'll head into the bath first. Oh~? Glasses, glasses~
hourly.2200: It's 10 at night. Commander-sama, how are you doing?
hourly.2300: 11 o'clock~. Commander-sama~, Makigumo, is all sleepy~...
